attributes.action: pass law requiring all owners of more than one home to sell any additional properties which they cannot justify ownership reasons for (i.e. 1 house must be the primary lodging of a person/family and all others must be sold)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Second homes account for a large part of the UK housing market forcing developers to build unnecessary new homes in an already over-crowded country. By reducing the amount of homes people own to the number that they are actually living in we can reduce the speed at which Greenfield sites are being eroded and begin to tackle the growing problems of 'first time buying'.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
